# In the morning
  
## Getting up

```{r, engine='bash'}
git log --all --decorate --oneline --graph
```

<canvas id="first-commit"></canvas>
<script>

function makeBase(id) {

var base = {
  elementId: id,
  orientation: "horizontal",
  mode: "compact"
};

return base;

};

var base = makeBase("first-commit")

var gitgraph = new GitGraph(base);
var master = gitgraph.branch("master");
master.commit();
</script>

- Turn off alarm
- Get out of bed

<canvas id="more-commits"></canvas>

<script>
var base_mc = makeBase("more-commits");

var gitgraph_mc = new GitGraph(base_mc);
var master_mc = gitgraph_mc.branch("master");
master_mc.commit().commit().commit();
</script>
